casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Audrey GOBAL. No. 545A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 17, 2007. Brian Michael Aus, Durham, for Gobal.

C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for. State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of December 2007 by State of NC for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. State of NC shall have up to and including the 6th day of February 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of December 2007."
